rt: Target Register: the 2nd source register/target register in I-type instructions
rd: Destination Register: the destination register in R-type instructions
shamt: Shift Amount: the amount of shift in shift instructions
address: Function Code: the specific operation in R-type instructions
offset: A 16-bit signed value used to calculate memory addresses in load/store instructions
imm: A 16-bit constant value used in arithmetic, logical, and load/store operations
target: A 26-bit value used in jump instructions to determine the target address
